resources.string: An active open source Linux-based OS with desktop gui, audio, network
Ubuntu is a Debian-based Linux operating system known for its user-friendly interface and open-source foundation
Windows is a widely used operating system developed by Microsoft, known for its graphical user interface and broad compatibility with software and hardware

VirtIO is a standardized interface for virtualization, providing high-performance virtual device support for Windows running on QEMU.
